EmailTemplate.subject: A whole-person approach to mental health care
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
For every step of the healthcare journey: Mental healthcare With mental health concerns on the rise, mental health services are a priority in the workplace. This is especially critical for people living with chronic conditions who face compounded challenges due to the stress of managing their health. Evolving needs require a flexible solution.
Almost one in five adults in America—just under 50 million people—are currently living with a mental illness,1 and among those with mental health concerns who sought support, 78% prefer a single app for self-management of physical and mental health.2
